page.title: 06CASTLEMANS FARM
page.content: Castlemans Farm occupies 80 acres of land.The crops are varied and include grasses for stock;barley,wheat and oats for feed;maize,turnips and potatoes.No potatoes have been planted this year but all the others have.All summer is used for harvesting .The farmer and his wife have 4 employees plus their wives and extra help is hired when needed such as at harvest. There are seven buildings that make up the farm,the barn being the oldest-built in the 17th century .The main house is somewhat younger-built around the turn of the 18th century.The farmhouse is the newest building built about 1920. The farm has the following stock-84 cows,6 pigs,14 turkeys,2 horses and some chickens.
